definition: free and easy (idiom); carefree/leisurely
self/oneself/from/since/naturally/surely
to follow/from/it is for...to/reason/cause/because of/due to/to/to leave it (to sb)/by (introduces passive verb)
self/oneself/from/since/naturally/surely
(located) at/(to be) in/to exist/in the middle of doing sth/(indicating an action in progress)

sentences.english: Why can't I fly like a bird in the blue sky?
sentences.chinese: 我爲什麼不能像小鳥一樣在藍天上自由自在地翱翔呢？

sentences.english: I’m free for the first time in my life.
sentences.chinese: 有生以來我第一次感到如此自由自在。

sentences.english: He preferred living freely wth rubbish.
sentences.chinese: 他寧願自由自在地與垃圾爲伍。

sentences.english: Buffalos used to roam freely on the Colorado Plains.
sentences.chinese: 水牛以前常常自由自在地在科羅拉多平原上漫步。

sentences.english: I was her, she was me, we were young, we were free.
sentences.chinese: 曾經，我們兩小無猜，自由自在。

sentences.english: Cathy and I escaped from the washhouse to have a ramble at liberty.
sentences.chinese: 凱帝和我從洗衣房溜出來想自由自在地溜達溜達。

sentences.english: Functionality that you can pick and choose as you wish.
sentences.chinese: 你可以自由自在滴自己挑選你所想要的功能。

sentences.english: He is in good spirits, handsome and free and strong.
sentences.chinese: 他情緒很好，英俊倜儻，自由自在而又意志堅強。

sentences.english: The head of the birds in the blue sky of take one's ease.
sentences.chinese: 頭上的小鳥在瓦藍的天空中自由自在地飛翔。

sentences.english: Herds of cattle roamed at will over the plain.
sentences.chinese: 牛羣在平原上自由自在地走動。

sentences.english: Maybe you want the freedom of working for yourself.
sentences.chinese: 或許你想自由自在的爲自己工作。

sentences.english: Butterflies are free, the saying goes.
sentences.chinese: 常言道，蝴蝶是自由自在的。

sentences.english: It was a commodious and a diverting life.
sentences.chinese: 這是一種自由自在，令人賞心悅目的生活。

sentences.english: The freedom and self-confidence of the elegant classes is spreading all over the place.
sentences.chinese: 空氣中瀰漫着優雅階層自然自由自在自信的氣息。

sentences.english: Except you enthrall me, never shall be free.
sentences.chinese: 倘若不被你奴役，我絕不會自由自在。

sentences.english: Likes free sauntering in the blue color sky flies in circles.
sentences.chinese: 喜歡在蘭色的天空中自由自在的遨翔。

carefree and without worries (idiom)

to have no cares/to be carefree

to follow one's heart's desires/to do as one pleases (idiom)
to soar/to wheel about in the sky
happy/cheerful
happy and content (idiom)
to travel/to go on a tour/to roam
to find amusement in one's own way/to enjoy oneself quietly
confident and at ease/free and easy

as much as one likes
